message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a fantastic opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you reaching out. However, $175 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product but I'm only able to offer $100 at this time.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I understand that $175 might be a bit too high for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $145. This is a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
